mean_cn: n. 眨眼；眼色；闪烁；打信号；熄灭；  vi. 眨眼；眨眼示意；使眼色；  vt. 眨；发信号
mean_en: an act of closing and opening one eye very quickly often as a way of giving a secret signal or private message to someone
short_phrase: She winks and gives the "thumbs up".
sentence: I think she was only joking--she winked at me.
sentence_trans: 我想她只是在开玩笑—她对我眨眼了。
